column4: it happen only to me once. The first time i used it ..but its ok now ..
as in you got unbanned?
not banned ..just got a security alert saying ..login failed several times..
I got an email saying I was banned for being "involved in actions deemed inappropriate for Diablo III"
hmm...it might be a spam or something ..
no cos I went to the blizzard site, logged in and it was banned
try to check your account in Blizzard website..
same when I try to log into the game
do not rely on emails ...lot of people ..will always try to get accounts..
I know, I can't even post on blizzard boards cos I'm banned
try contacting blizzard support ...as long as you have the key ..
and yea I receive like 10 fake blizzard emails a day
good for you ..only have 10 ..i have like ..30 to 50 ..
especially when they know that you are already on a higher levels.
lol. I'm waiting for them to reply
I have crap characters
and very bad gear
im sure you'll get it back ..
I got my 2nd legendary item last night... lvl 17 item XD
and I should shutup, or someone will say I'm OT again
:x
heheh!! ..
